00064 void CellStoreTrailerV0::serialize(uint8_t *buf) {
00065   uint8_t *base = buf;
00066   encode_i32(&buf, fix_index_offset);
00067   encode_i32(&buf, var_index_offset);
00068   encode_i32(&buf, filter_offset);
00069   encode_i32(&buf, index_entries);
00070   encode_i32(&buf, total_entries);
00071   encode_i32(&buf, blocksize);
00072   encode_i64(&buf, timestamp.logical);
00073   encode_i64(&buf, timestamp.real);
00074   encode_i32(&buf, compression_ratio_i32);
00075   encode_i16(&buf, compression_type);
00076   encode_i16(&buf, version);
00077   assert((buf-base) == (int)CellStoreTrailerV0::size());
00078   (void)base;
00079 }

00085 void CellStoreTrailerV0::deserialize(const uint8_t *buf) {
00086   HT_TRY("deserializing cellstore trailer",
00087     size_t remaining = CellStoreTrailerV0::size();
00088     fix_index_offset = decode_i32(&buf, &remaining);
00089     var_index_offset = decode_i32(&buf, &remaining);
00090     filter_offset = decode_i32(&buf, &remaining);
00091     index_entries = decode_i32(&buf, &remaining);
00092     total_entries = decode_i32(&buf, &remaining);
00093     blocksize = decode_i32(&buf, &remaining);
00094     timestamp.logical = decode_i64(&buf, &remaining);
00095     timestamp.real = decode_i64(&buf, &remaining);
00096     compression_ratio_i32 = decode_i32(&buf, &remaining);
00097     compression_type = decode_i16(&buf, &remaining);
00098     version = decode_i16(&buf, &remaining));
00099 }
